# allowsPickingMultipleItems

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the user can select and open more than one document at a time.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsPickingMultipleItems: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this property is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Configuring a document browser

- **allowsDocumentCreation**: A Boolean value that determines whether the document browser can create new documents.
- **revealDocument(at:importIfNeeded:completion:)**: Reveals, and optionally imports, the document at the provided URL.
- **contentTypesForRecentDocuments**: Content types for browsing recent documents.
